name: Mango
description: A mango is an edible stone fruit produced by the tropical tree Mangifera indica. It is believed to have originated between northwestern Myanmar, Bangladesh

name: Pomegranate
description: low in calories and fat but high in fiber, vitamins, and minerals.Benefits include antioxidants, heart health, urinary health, exercise endurance

name: Plum
description: Vitamin C found in plums helps your body build muscle, form blood vessels, recover, and is beneficial for eyes. It is a fruit of some species in Prunus subg

name: Orange
description: Type of low calorie, highly nutritious citrus fruit. contribute to strong, clear skin and can help lower a person’s risk of many conditions.

name: Water Melon
description: sweet and refreshing low calorie,provides hydration and also essential nutrients, including vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants

name: Lemon
description: Citric acid may amount to 5 percent or more by weight of the lemon’s juice, rich in vitamin C and contains smaller amounts of  B vitamins, riboflavin, niacin.

name: Guava
description: Guava fruits are amazingly rich in antioxidants, vitamin C, potassium, and fiber.remarkable nutrient content gives them many health benefits

name: Grapes
description: Their colorful globe-like, juicy, sugary berries are what we call grapes, whether they come in blue, purple, red, pink, green, violet.

name: Pine apple
description: Pineapple(Ananas comosus)tropical fruit,packed with nutrients, antioxidants, and such as enzymes protect against inflammation and disease,freshlycut
